io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.network

Class NetworkX

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.network.NetworkX
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NetworkImpl

    public abstract class NetworkX
extends java.lang.Object
    A class implementing network logic. You should subclass it and create an instance in your mods constructor. registerPackets() will then automatically be called during setup phase. You can register custom packets there. The order in which they are registered is important.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        protected <T> void register(PacketSerializer<T> serializer,
                            java.util.function.Supplier<java.util.function.BiConsumer<T,java.util.function.Supplier<net.minecraftforge.fml.network.NetworkEvent.Context>>> handler,
                            net.minecraftforge.fml.network.NetworkDirection direction)
        Registers a packet handler.
        Parameters:
        handler - The double lambda is required to prevent classloading on the server.
        direction - The network direction the packet should go.

      • getProtocolVersion

        protected abstract java.lang.String getProtocolVersion()
        Gets the protocol version for this network. This must be the same on client and server. It's recommended to use whole numbers here and increase them when you change something in a packet format or add a new packet.

      • registerPackets

        protected abstract void registerPackets()
        You can register your own packets here. The order is important.
